body:
You want to know the **World Golf Rankings** after each week of the PGA Tour? Bet Refinery has got your back. However, we're not giving you the official ones. You can go **[here](http://www.owgr.com/ranking)** for the square version. We're giving you the **betting version** of the World Golf Rankings. - - - ## **Bet Refinery World Golf Rankings** What an unbelievable talent pool of professional golfers. John Rahm and Xander Schauffele have gone back and forth on top spot a few times, and then you've got DJ, JT and Rory always right there as well. Plus Brooks, Bryson and some of the up and coming guys. The Rankings up date every week, based on recent performance. So check out the top 50 world golf rankings (according to our Model) below:
- - - ## **Golf Picks** Keep an eye out for our weekly predictions and don't forget our **[Expert Betting Guide](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/how-to-bet-on-golf)**.
title: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors)
seoTitle: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors) | Top Golfers
description: Live World Golf Rankings, updated every week. Xander, Rahm, JT, DJ, Rory, who is on top now? Get the updated World Golf Rankings every week.
